lyrics.stanza: Joined to the Christ victorious, And workings of His cross, I'm nourished e'en in sufferings, And safe in any loss.
Joined to the Christ, the risen One, Ascended into heav'n; In light of the eternal cross, Unbounded grace is giv'n.
Joined to the Christ victorious, My spirit's joys increase; I call the holy, highest name, And Satan's powers cease.
Joined to the Christ, the sovereign One, To Him I long to cling. His cross has spoiled the serpent's work, Of vict'ry now I sing.
